mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and blue on white) announcing Starwood Amphitheater's 2006 list of performers including Warped Tour, Sammy Hagar, Black Crowes, Hootie and the Blowfish, Steely Dan and Michael McDonald, Poison and Cinderella, John Pogerty and Willie Nelson, Korn, Lynyrd Skynyrd, Dave Matthews Band, Counting Crows and Goo Goo Dolls, Buzzfest, Hank Williams Jr., John Mayer and Sheryl Crow, and Aerosmith and the Motley Crew.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
